name: Kebab's quest
description:
What would happen if you crossed a sacred monolith one day? Will someone come from another universe to control you? And what if you only wanted to live your life peacefully?

-- Instruction --

1.Move, jump and crouch with the arrow keys

2.Shoot with the left click.

-- Who are we ? --

We are just a discord full of friends, and we wanted to try the jam without any experiences.

Big thank to : Algtas / Poulpe / Lovelydragon / Etmull / Danael and the full Kraken's discord.

Lot of narrative, like Kojima's Game
